verses.verse: Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4033>where<s%> his father had <S%H1>sojourned,<s%> in the <S%H4033>land<s%> of <S%H776>Canaan.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> when <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H1121>age,<s%> was <S%H7462>pasturing<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers<s%> while he was [still] a <S%H5288>youth,<s%> along with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> his father's <S%H1>wives.<s%> And <S%H802>Joseph<s%> <S%H3130>brought<s%> back a <S%H935>bad<s%> <S%H1681><s%> <S%H7451>report<s%> about them to their father.

Now <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his <S%H2208>old<s%> <S%H2208>age;<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H6446>varicolored<s%> <S%H3801>tunic.<s%>

And his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their father <S%H1>loved<s%> him <S%H157>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H4480>all<s%> his <S%H3605>brothers;<s%> and [so] they <S%H251>hated<s%> him and <S%H8130>could<s%> not <S%H3201>speak<s%> to him on <S%H1696>friendly<s%> <S%H7965>terms.<s%>

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and when he <S%H5046>told<s%> it to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him <S%H5750>even<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%> <S%H5750><s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H2492>had;<s%>

for <S%H2009>behold,<s%> we were <S%H481>binding<s%> <S%H485>sheaves<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H2009>lo,<s%> my <S%H485>sheaf<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> <S%H5324>erect;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H485>sheaves<s%> <S%H5437>gathered<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to my <S%H485>sheaf.<s%> "

Then his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Are you <S%H4427>actually<s%> going to <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us? <S%H518>Or<s%> are you <S%H4910>really<s%> going to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over us?" So they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him <S%H5750>even<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> for his <S%H2472>dreams<s%> and for his <S%H1697>words.<s%>

Now he <S%H2492>had<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and <S%H5608>related<s%> it to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Lo,<s%> I have <S%H2492>had<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> another <S%H2472>dream;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> were <S%H7812>bowing<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to me."

And he <S%H5608>related<s%> [it] to his father and to his <S%H1>brothers;<s%> and his father <S%H251>rebuked<s%> him and <S%H1>said<s%> to him, <S%H1605>"What<s%> is <S%H559>this<s%> <S%H4100>dream<s%> that you have <S%H2088>had<s%>? Shall I and your <S%H2472>mother<s%> and your <S%H2492>brothers<s%> <S%H517>actually<s%> <S%H251>come<s%> to <S%H935>bow<s%> ourselves <S%H935>down<s%> before you to the <S%H7812>ground<s%>?"
And his <S%H251>brothers<s%> were <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of him, but his father <S%H1>kept<s%> the <S%H8104>saying<s%> [in mind.]
Then his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7462>pasture<s%> their father's <S%H6629>flock<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "Are not your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7462>pasturing<s%> [the flock] in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>? <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you to them." And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "I will <S%H2009>go.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1980>"Go<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> about the <S%H7965>welfare<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> and the <S%H7965>welfare<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to me." So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> him from the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> him, and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was <S%H8582>wandering<s%> in the <S%H7704>field;<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> are you <S%H1245>looking<s%> for?"
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H1245>looking<s%> for my <S%H251>brothers;<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H375>where<s%> they are <S%H7462>pasturing<s%> [the flock.]"

Then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "They have <S%H5265>moved<s%> from <S%H2088>here;<s%> for I <S%H8085>heard<s%> [them] <S%H559>say,<s%> 'Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1886>Dothan.<s%>'" So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> after his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> them at <S%H1886>Dothan.<s%>

When they <S%H7200>saw<s%> him from a <S%H7350>distance<s%> and <S%H2962>before<s%> he <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>close<s%> to them, they <S%H5230>plotted<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> him to <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H1976>this<s%> <S%H1167>dreamer<s%><S%H2472>!<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then, <S%H1980>come<s%> and let us <S%H2026>kill<s%> him and <S%H7993>throw<s%> him into <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H953>pits;<s%> and we will <S%H559>say,<s%> 'A <S%H7451>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> him.' Then let us <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> of his <S%H2472>dreams!<s%>"
But <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [this] and <S%H5337>rescued<s%> him out of their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us not <S%H5221>take<s%> his <S%H5315>life.<s%>"

<S%H7205>Reuben<s%> further <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8210>"Shed<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%> <S%H7993>Throw<s%> him into <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H953>pit<s%> that is in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> but do not <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> on him" â€“ that he might <S%H5337>rescue<s%> him out of their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> to <S%H7725>restore<s%> him to his father.

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H9201>when<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>reached<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> that they <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> of his <S%H3801>tunic,<s%> the <S%H6446>varicolored<s%> <S%H3801>tunic<s%> that was on him;
and they <S%H3947>took<s%> him and <S%H7993>threw<s%> him into the <S%H953>pit.<s%> Now the <S%H953>pit<s%> was <S%H7386>empty,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> any <S%H4325>water<s%> in it.

Then they <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> a <S%H3899>meal.<s%> And as they <S%H5375>raised<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H736>caravan<s%> of <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> was <S%H935>coming<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> with their <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H5219>aromatic<s%> <S%H5219>gum<s%> and <S%H6875>balm<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh,<s%> on their <S%H1980>way<s%> to <S%H3381>bring<s%> [them] <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> <S%H1215>profit<s%> is it for us to <S%H2026>kill<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> up his <S%H1818>blood<s%>?

<S%H1980>"Come<s%> and let us <S%H4376>sell<s%> him to the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> and not <S%H1961>lay<s%> our <S%H3027>hands<s%> on him; for he is our <S%H251>brother,<s%> our [own] <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>" And his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> [to him.]

Then <S%H376>some<s%> <S%H4084>Midianite<s%> <S%H5503>traders<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> by, so they <S%H4900>pulled<s%> [him] up and <S%H5927>lifted<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> out of the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and <S%H4376>sold<s%> him to the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> for <S%H6242>twenty<s%> [shekels] of <S%H3701>silver.<s%> Thus they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
Now <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was not in the <S%H953>pit;<s%> so he <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H899>garments.<s%>
And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3206>boy<s%> is not [there;] as for me, <S%H575>where<s%> am I to <S%H935>go<s%>?"
So they <S%H3947>took<s%> Joseph's <S%H3801>tunic,<s%> and <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> a <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat,<s%> and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> the <S%H3801>tunic<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood;<s%>

and they <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H6446>varicolored<s%> <S%H3801>tunic<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to their father and <S%H1>said,<s%> "We <S%H559>found<s%> <S%H4672>this;<s%> <S%H2088>please<s%> <S%H4994>examine<s%> [it] to [see] whether it is your son's <S%H5234>tunic<s%> <S%H3801>or<s%> not."

Then he <S%H5234>examined<s%> it and <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is my son's <S%H3801>tunic.<s%> A <S%H7451>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> him; <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> has <S%H2963>surely<s%> been <S%H2963>torn<s%> to <S%H2963>pieces!<s%>"

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on his <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H56>mourned<s%> for his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> him, but he <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H5162>comforted.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Surely<s%> I will <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> in <S%H57>mourning<s%> for my <S%H1121>son.<s%>" So his father <S%H1>wept<s%> for him.
Meanwhile, the <S%H4084>Midianites<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> him in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H6318>Potiphar,<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H5631>officer,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>bodyguard.<s%>
